system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.iHruvh0FiUFh3EDH]{Distance Rifle Specialist}

Benefits

When firing an anti-materiel rifle or designated marksman rifle with a deployed bipod, a character may brace the rifle for an additional +2 bonus to all attacks.

Special

Bracing costs no Combat Points
